document.full_text: bahraini police blocked thousands of protesters from reaching the royal court friday to try to defuse tension on a gulf island where the majority is shi'ite muslim but the ruling family is sunni.
document.title: bahrain police block march on royal palace
lines_and_colors: bahraini police blocked thousands of protesters from reaching the royal court friday to try to defuse tension on a gulf island where the majority is shi'ite muslim but the ruling family is sunni.
